common.i18n

Class YamlI18nResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sphere.sdk.models.Base
      • common.i18n.YamlI18nResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    I18nResolver

    public final class YamlI18nResolver
extends io.sphere.sdk.models.Base
implements I18nResolver
    Resolves the i18n messages using YAML files defined in a webjar located in the classpath.

        Description copied from interface: I18nResolver
        Resolves i18n message identified by a bundle and a key for the given locale.
        Specified by:
        get in interface I18nResolver
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale used to translate the message
        bundle - name of the bundle containing the message key
        key - identifier of the message
        args - optional list of arguments
        Returns:
        the resolved message in the given language, or absent if it could not be found
